name: semi.Rsrh
formula: ( semi.N * semi.P - semi.ni_mod^2) / (semi.taup * (semi.N + semi.n1) + semi.taun*(semi.P + semi.p1))

name: semi.n1
formula:
# semi.ni_eff: Effective intrinsic carrier concentration
# semi.Delta_Et: Energy difference between the defect level and the intrinsic level

semi.gamma_n * semi.ni_eff * exp(semi.Delta_Et / semi.Vth)

name: semi.p1
formula:
# semi.ni_eff: Effective intrinsic carrier concentration
# semi.Delta_Et: Energy difference between the defect level and the intrinsic level

semi.gamma_p * semi.ni_eff * exp(-semi.Delta_Et / semi.Vth)

name: semi.Delta_Et
meaning: Energy difference between the defect level and the intrinsic level
